line_1: Them right an' tight in thack an' raep.
line_2: An' nought but his han'-daurk, to keep

line_1: That vile, wanchancie thing — a raep!
line_2: Wae worth that man wha first did shape,

line_1: That vile, wanchancie thing — a raep!
line_2: It maks guid fellows girn an' gape,

line_1: That vile, wanchancie thing — a raep!
line_2: An' Robin's bonnet wave wi' crape
